subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Dietary Supplements and Herbal Remedies
Diet and Nutrition
lead_paragraph: The D.E.A. has classified Madol and two other drugs as anabolic steroids, meaning they can no longer be sold as dietary supplements.
snippet: The D.E.A. has classified Madol and two other drugs as anabolic steroids, meaning they can no longer be sold as dietary supplements.
